blackHoles.name: Sagittarius A*
blackHoles.description: Sagittarius A* is a supermassive black hole located at the center of the Milky Way galaxy.

blackHoles.name: M87*
blackHoles.description: M87* is a supermassive black hole located in the center of the M87 galaxy.

blackHoles.name: Cygnus X-1
blackHoles.description: Cygnus X-1 is a stellar-mass black hole located in the constellation Cygnus.

blackHoles.name: TON 618
blackHoles.description: TON 618 is an extremely massive black hole located in the constellation Canes Venatici.
